name: Isolated (itch)
description:
From RECON Entertainment and Swagg Studios, the Creators of Insane.EXE and Suicide Tom comes a new 3D RPG Horror Video Game.

A short experimental horror game made using RPG Maker VX Ace, created by Japenese developer Enterbrain. We also made 50% of the game while Swagg Studios did the other 50% of the game too.

It is a maze game in which you must complete three simple mazes while avoiding the Slender Man in it.
